Ok, to finish this topic, I will have to finish up with attacks for 
both faeries and Giant Skeletons.

faeries - Suicide attack.  All of the energy gets converted into one 
blow of faerie dust.  Another proposed attack would be "Carry'.  This 
would allow faeries to carry their own teammates.  Hmm.  What would be 
a third attack?

--- In gladiator@y..., "Daniel Paul Hightower" <dph_of_rules@y...> 
wrote:
> Golems - Only new attack I could think I was 'Tornado'.  A golem 
spins 
> its body around, allowing it to temporarily go through trees and 
over 
> water.  The attack would hurt opponents who get hit by the golem and 
> this new attack would effectively make attacks against Golems count 
as 
> 1/2-1/4 their value.  Wait minute, why not give Golems a pinball 
mode 
> attack.  All it would do is roll around and hit objecdts,  This 
attack 
> would give Golems incredible speed.
> 
> Giant Skeletons - Definitely 'Split' into 5-6 normal sized 
skeletons. 
>  No inspiration for an original attack.  Maybe if I had more sleep 
> [it's not my fault, just the moron I live with], I might be able to 
> think of something.
> 
> I believe in limiting each character to 4 attacks with possible 
> alternates for each attack.  This will keep any character from 
> becoming too powerfull.
